attributes.action: Stop Forum Users Posting the 'Jumping Bay' Video on VZone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Forum Users Posting the 'Jumping Bay' Video on VZ. It clearly demonstrates the use of a classic vehicle in an inconsiderate manner, plus, we've all seen it before. Thank you.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
